mapper.update: insert into hwk_homework (schedule_id,user_id, title,content,homework_words,secret, delete_status,create_time,update_time) select #{scheduleId},#{userId},#{title},#{content},#{homeworkWords},#{secret},'1',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM hwk_homework WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM hwk_homework WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId} and user_id=#{userId}) limit 1;
update hwk_homework set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, homework_words=#{homeworkWords}, secret=#{secret}, update_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where schedule_id = #{scheduleId} and user_id=#{userId};

update hwk_homework set comment=#{comment},
review_score=#{reviewScore},
review_score='0',
review_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, review_teacher_id = #{reviewTeacherId} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id id, schedule_no scheduleNo, schedule_name scheduleName from cos_schedule where course_id=#{courseId} and delete_status='1'
select a.user_id id, b.username userName, b.nickname nickname from cos_class a left join sys_user b on a.user_id =b.id where a.course_id=#{courseId} and a.delete_status = '1' and a.role != '讲师'
